original_title: De Vliegende Panters: De Grote Drie
overview: Stage registration of the third comedy special (2002-2004) by the Dutch comedy troupe De Vliegende Panters (The Flying Panters).  The show consists of songs and sketches on various topics such as James Bond, Hamlet, Shakespeare and Thyestes.
title: De Vliegende Panters: De Grote Drie
